features: FIRST IN ITS CLASS PROBIOTIC MOUTHWASH - This pH Balancing dentist formulated Mouthwash is made to work with your oral ecosystem, not against it. A unique formulation of Riven’s signature antioxidants, minerals and botanicals that supports your saliva’s natural defenses.

CLEAN INGREDIENTS TEETH NEED & NONE THEY DON’T - This cool mint vegan Mouthwash contains a combination of plant extracts that freshens breath, keeps teeth and gums clean while moisturizes dry oral tissue, FREE OF Fluoride, alcohol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), parabens and more.
24 HOUR BAD BREATH PROTECTION - This Mouthwash will freshen breath while soothing soft tissue in the oral cavity resulting in improved appearance of tissue and a pleasant, fresh feeling in the mouth.

NEXT LEVEL FRESHNESS - A mouthwash that is thoughtfully formulated with mint from farm grown peppermint, a well-known antiseptic that kills bad germs that cause bad breath. throw in Xylitol, to keep the alcohol out (no burning and stinging, yay!), and you have a little swish of heaven.
GREAT FOR GUM HEALTH - A healthier mouth starts with good bacteria that’s alive. Riven’s mouthwash inhibits the growth of bad bacteria and leaves the mouth healthy and fresh.

Ingredients: Water Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Xylitol (Birch Tree Sugar) Stevia (Stevia Rebadiana Leaf Extract) Grape Seed Extract (Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract) Pineapple Enzyme (Bromelain) Probiotic (Lactobacillus Reuteri) Probiotic (Lactobacillus Paracasei) Prebiotic Inulin Chickory Root (Chichorium Intybus) Zinc Gluconate Cranberry Seed Oil (Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil) Lactobacillus Ferment Echinacea (Echinacea Purpurea Extract) Natural Flavoring (Flavor) Baking Soda (Sodium Bicarbonate)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended by dentist
reviews.reviewText: This product was recommended to me by my dentist and has been the best recommendation as it has helped bring the levels of the biofilm that creates around my teeth at night time to decrease. There’s something in the formula that makes my mouth feel better. I love this mouthwash. I would totally recommend if you’re looking for something natural.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tasting moutwash ever!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouthwash. It's not minty like most mouthwashes. It's a blend of different flavors, it lequite a pleasant taste actually. And it leaves my mouth smelling fresh. I'm using it because I am recovering from thrush. It works well and it doesn't sting your mouth if you have thrush or burning mouth syndrome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice mouthwash with a smooth, light tasting flavor. I bought it to try and control thrush in my mouth. I aquired it by taking too many antibiotics.This is the 1st bottle that I've purchased. It controls the pain inside my mouth very well but I've not used it long enough to see if it helps with ridding me of the thrush.I'll post an updated t review after I use this for a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is that good, period.
reviews.reviewText: I have endured years of dry mouth and oral bacterial colonization. Of course, it is common knowledge that bacteria inhabit almost every cavity in the body. That isn't what I'm talking about here. What I'm talking about is not normal and manifests as white film on my tongue. I have tried every major toothpaste and mouthwash to date. None of them worked, until I stumbled on Riven Probiotic Mouth. Within two weeks of using this product, I knew I had found my answer. Not wanting to run out, I ordered two additional bottles. The manufacturer was out because I think many had discovered it too. I don't know if this product works so well because of the care the manufacturer takes to ensure that the bacteria in the formulation that's delivered to one's doorstep are viable for the entire duration of use or whether it's because of the synergy of the ingredients used. The short of it is, this product is life-changing and I would dare say miraculous. I use an antimicrobial, fluoride-based toothpaste. I give it about an hour to work before using this probiotic mouthwash. I'm able to do this because the bacteria in the formulation are viable at room temperature and is ideal to take anywhere.Opinions may change over time, but I see this product as the future of oral care. Period. It's that good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to try this after recovering from oral thrush, I wanted to create a better balance to my mouth. The first time I tried it I used it right before bed, which I learned was a mistake because the aftertaste is terrible and I ended up having to taste it all night long. I decided instead to take it in the mornings, and that worked out better. It still has a bitter aftertaste, but if you eat or drink a little something an hour later, it takes care of it. I did like the way my gums felt after using it. However, I am not sure how effective it was in restoring the flora balance…I actually quit using it and seem to be recovering better without it! That being said, I feel like it was too expensive for the mixed results I experienced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed by results
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this probiotic mouthwash from Amazon and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with the results. After just a few uses, I can already feel the difference in my oral health.What sets this mouthwash apart from other drug store alternatives like Listerine is that it contains probiotics, which help to balance the natural bacteria in your mouth. Not only does this help to improve your overall oral health, but it also helps to prevent bad breath.The taste of this mouthwash is also much more pleasant than other brands I've tried. It has a subtle mint flavor that doesn't leave an overpowering aftertaste or burn like some of the other mouthwashes on the market.One of the things I appreciate most about this product is that it is alcohol-free. This means that it doesn't dry out my mouth or cause any discomfort, which can often be a side effect of using other mouthwashes.Overall, I would highly recommend this probiotic mouthwash to anyone looking to improve their oral health. It is effective, gentle, and has a great taste. I don't think I could ever go back to using other drug store alternatives like Listerine after experiencing the benefits of this product.
